title: On-chip Quantum Memory
description: Developed a cavity-enhanced quantum memory on a chip, utilizing Erbium-doped Lithium Niobate waveguides to enable the next generation of scalable quantum networks.

title: LNOI Nanofabrication
description: Pioneered the optimized nano-fabrication of low loss photonic devices on the Lithium Niobate on Insulator (LNOI) platform.

title: Millisecond Storage Quantum Memory
description: Demonstrated a multiplexed quantum memory with simultaneously storage and on-demand recall of up to 60 qubits, achieving a record millisecond storage lifetime at telecom wavelengths

title: Silicon Photonics
description: Executed the full design-to-test cycle for Silicon photonics devices, demonstrating on-chip entangled photon pair generation for quantum communication.

title: MDI Quantum Key Distribution
description: Led a multi-disciplinary project to architect and build a measurement-device-independent quantum key distribution (MDI-QKD) prototype, leveraging time-bin encoding for commercialisation.
